title: Must Watch: Danny MacAskill Checks Out the adidas HQ – And Rides a Bike on a Bike!
content:
It’s been a while since the last video of Danny MacAskill on his trials bike. There have been a handfull of videos since then, but it seems like they’ve mostly been on full suspension Santa Cruz mountain bikes.

Thanks to the latest video from adidas though, Danny is back in full force – with huge drops, spins, flips, and the infectious creativity that make his videos so damn enjoyable. Might this be the first bike on bike surfing?

The post Must Watch: Danny MacAskill Checks Out the adidas HQ – And Rides a Bike on a Bike! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
